item.title: Kaggle competition - Learning from disaster
item.description: This project was a submission in the learning from disaster Kaggle competition. Logistic Regression analysis was used to predict whether a passenger would survive based on data such as their ticket fare, port of embarkation, number of siblings or parents onboard etc. the final models prediction accuracy was 77%. Project Files - GitHub Repository link
